title: STill have no star guardian Lux Icon
body: I did the test and I got Jinx and then I never recieved my icon. :c

replies.body:
As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, it can take numerous days for the icon to be delivered to your account. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

It can take up to a week for the icon to added, so just hang tight and you will get it soon enough.

[Source](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/fRuOekr3-the-star-guardian-quiz?comment=0001).
